item.title: BALL x PIT ‘The Regal Update’ launches January 26
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

New characters, balls, passives, and features.

BALL x PIT‘s first free major update, “The Regal Update,” will launch on January 26, publisher Devolver Digital and developer Kenny Sun announced. It will add new characters, balls, passives, and features.

Here is an overview of the update, via Devolver Digital:

This free update adds a wealth of new content to the game, including new characters, new balls, new passives, and some new features many of you have been crying out for since launch.

Meet our two new treasure seekers:

  • The Carouser, whose returning balls orbit around him.
  • The Falconer, flanked by her two trusted falcons that throw balls.

In addition to the new treasure seekers joining the roster, “The Regal Update” will also introduce eight new balls and several new passives.

But that’s not all! We’ve got a nice surprise we don’t want to spoil just yet—but we’re sure you’re all going to love it. Stay tuned for Monday, January 26, when “The Regal Update” officially launches!

Thank you all for your support!

BALL x PIT is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/ball-x-pit-the-regal-update-launches-january-26
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Co-op horror game KLETKA launches February 19 for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Currently in Early Access for PC.

Cooperative horror game KLETKA will leave Early Access and launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on February 19, publisher Sobaka Studio and developer Callback announced.

KLETKA first launched in Early Access for PC on December 13, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Sobaka Studio:

The most dangerous criminals are convicted and sent to Kletka. Your sentence is to descend into the depths of the Gigastructure while maintaining a living and hungry elevator. Never forget to feed it if you don’t want to end up being eaten alive. Kletka is omnivorous, be ready to feed it both fuel and flesh.

The Gigastructure is an endlessly expanding building. Traps and anomalies fill the corridors. Any stop you make could be your last.

Samosbor is a mysterious anomaly that kills anything in its path. This terrifying phenomenon is feared by all inhabitants as no one has ever survived it. When you hear the siren, it’s time to drop everything and run to the elevator as fast as you can. Kletka is the only thing that can protect you from this anomaly.

Form a team of up to six people and descend in the elevator. Friends tend to survive when they work together, but friends also make for good fuel.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/co-op-horror-game-kletka-launches-february-19-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc
